name: Dodger Plane
description:
This a really simple game developed with libgdx.

I'm still learning it, and this game is insanely hard just like original flappy bird.

And if you manage to get score more than 20, then send the screenshot at my discord server, link - https://discord.gg/hZmMuYFQR6

YOU NEED TO HAVE JAVA INSTALLED IN ORDER TO PLAY THIS GAME

Enjoy!
